attributes.action: Incarcerate Pete Doherty for his continued drug abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yet again "pop star" Pete Doherty has been arrested on suspicion of possession of a Class A drug.

Given his influence over the youth of today and his continued failure to abide by proscribed treatments, we the undersigned hereby request that the PM instructs the Law Courts to incarcerate him until such time as his addictions have been completely addressed

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
